name: one skein basket
sizes_available: 6" in diameter. it is 5" tall and 18" around the circumference.
notes:
***one skein basket***
crochet this happy, one skein basket in no time, learning a few essential techniques, too! this sweet, little basket may be used for many different purposes. it is crocheted from the bottom up, starting with a magic ring circle.

**materials**
one skein of plymouth yarn, fantasy naturale, 100% mercerized cotton yarn. 
140 yards.
size g (4.0mm) crochet hook. one locking stitch marker. yarn needle. 

the bottom of the basket is 6" in diameter. it is 5" tall and 18" around the circumference.

enjoy!
